Job Title: Software Development Engineer II Data Engineer
Job Description: Primary responsibilities for the role include:        Must have worked on writing optimized SQL queries. Experience on Hive or Spark-SQL is must.      Good experience in optimization of the SQL queries.      Experience on multiple DBs like SAP-Hana,  Oracle,  Teradata,  SQL-server is preferable.      Basic Experience on any of the programming languages like Java,  Scala,  Python,  etc.      Understand the concepts of data management in OLTP and OLAP data stores and has extensively used one or the other databases.      Work with Product Owner/Project Manager,  Lead Engineer and Clients to build various and dynamic use cases in the IP Product.      Lead and own delivery or work items,  highlight articulate dependencies and effectively communicate blockers that needs to be resolved at higher levels.      Must be willing to learn new technologies,  processes,  business functions,  client engagements.            Qualifications         REQUIRED         3-6 years of relevant experience      Must understand and conversant to code on at least One (or more) of these technologies       SQL      Hive / Spark SQL      SAP Hana / Sql-Server / MySQL /etc          PREFERRED         Scala/Python/Java      Containers and dockers      Security      Agile/Scrum methodology      Must be able to clearly articulate situations,  problems and communicate ideas and solutions
